messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]was: Is it normal?Now: sick
messages.msgSnippet: Definitely something going around!  Hope your little one is feeling better...mine is already back to being a spit fire... twirling her sister around in the
messages.messageBody:
Definitely something going around! Hope your little one is feeling better...mine is already back to being a spit fire... twirling her sister around in the easy chair....

I always say G-d was wise to give me her fifth...if she were first I don't know that I would have dared to have the other four!

Of course I still want more so I'm not sure how honest that assessment is!

be well,
Rachel Ann
----- Original Message -----
From: Beth Ali
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, November 10, 2002 8:10 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]was: Is it normal?Now: sick


I wonder if it's the same bug that's got my 4 yr. laying on the couch all day, hot and so pitiful looking:(
Beth in GA
But my 3 is a ball of fire! Smart as a whip...but sick today :-( poor bubble...she has a fever and doesn't look all that hot...

be well,
Rachel Ann
